response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds immense value to us and we believe it could be equally valuable to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $850,000. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we are confident that the product's capabilities will exceed your expectations. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 850000}
